mapper.select: SELECT P.NAME AS p_name, PM.NAME AS pm_name, C.CONTENT, CO.CONTENT AS co_content, C.W_DATE, R.R_CHECK FROM P_MEMBER PM, PET P, COUNSEL C, F_CODE CO, REVIEW R WHERE PM.P_ID = C.P_ID AND C.PET_NO= P.PET_NO AND CO.CODE = C.CODE AND R.C_NO = C.C_NO AND P.M_ID = #{m_id}
SELECT P.NAME AS p_name, P.M_ID, C.CONTENT, C.W_DATE, C.CODE, C.C_NO FROM PET P, MEMBER M, COUNSEL C WHERE P.PET_NO = C.PET_NO AND P.M_ID = M.M_ID AND P_ID= #{p_id} ORDER BY C_NO
